overview: In a dystopian society, different deterministic companies appear. Their goal: to create a perfect computer capable of predicting the fate of people in order to deprive them of any decision-making. To fight against these companies, anarchist groups are formed to defend the right to freedom. One night, a group of liberals led by Oscar decides to infiltrate the security system of EON Corp., the most important deterministic company, in order to get Alex, a key person in EON Corp's plans, out.
title: R.E.L.
